verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanks be to God for His indescribable gift! Thanks be to God for the Lord! (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanks be to God for His resurrection life! Thanks be to God for the Lord! (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanks be to God for His kingdom without end Thanks be to God for the Lord! (repeat){/lang-eng}
